report.title: Users list
report.description: A basic list of user accounts.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM users u JOIN people p on u.person_id=p.id LEFT JOIN users_websites uw on u.id=uw.user_id LEFT JOIN websites w on w.id=uw.website_id and w.deleted=false LEFT JOIN core_roles cr ON cr.id=u.core_role_id AND cr.deleted=false #joins# WHERE u.deleted = false AND #website_filter#

param.name: admin_user_id
param.description: Set this if the report is for a warehouse user with admin rights over only certain websites. Limits the report output to the users that are members of those websites, or users created by the user accessing the report unless that user is promoted to core admin.
param.join: LEFT JOIN users_websites uwp on uwp.website_id=uw.website_id and uwp.user_id=#admin_user_id# and coalesce(uwp.site_role_id, 4) < 3 -- site editor or admin
param.where: (uwp.id IS NOT NULL or (u.created_by_id=#admin_user_id# and u.core_role_id IS NULL))
